name: QR Matcher
description:
We all like matching games where we have to find matching pairs of cards. 

These cards can contain images of animals, countries, or even F1 drivers. But what if all cards would be a QR code? Let's find out! In this game, you have to match words based on their corresponding QR code. You can even add new word lists to play with those.

Can you beat the hardest level?
